text: Those Boys! is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithThose Boys!Those Boys! and stars Anita Hendrie, Linda Arvidson, and Clara T. Bracy. ==Actors== * Anita Hendrie as The Mother * Linda Arvidson as A Daughter * Clara T. Bracy * Florence Lawrence as The Maid * Dorothy West as A Daughter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Those Boys!
